item.title: MSNBC Apologizes for Analyst Matthew Dowd’s Commentary on Charlie Kirk’s Death: ‘Insensitive and Unacceptable’
item.description: MSNBC president Rebecca Kutler has issued an apology for analyst Matthew Dowd’s remarks during coverage of the shooting of conservative activist and Turning Point USA co-founder Charlie Kirk. “D

item.title: MSNBC to Change Name to MS NOW Under Versant
item.description: That’s My Source for News, Opinion and the World, obviously.

item.title: Jacob Soboroff Joining MSNBC As Split From NBC News Looms
item.description: Soboroff will become senior national and political correspondent, based in L.A., as MSNBC sets to spin into Versant.

item.title: Jacob Soboroff Joining MSNBC As Split From NBC News Looms
item.description: Soboroff will become senior national and political correspondent, based in L.A., as MSNBC sets to spin into Versant.

item.title: ‘NBC Nightly News’ EP Meghan Rafferty Exits to Join Versant
item.description: Rafferty will be vp of news standards, guiding the MSNBC and CNBC news operations once the Versant split is complete.

item.title: ‘NBC Nightly News’ EP Meghan Rafferty Exits to Join Versant

item.title: MSNBC Brings Back Live Fan Event In Bid to Build New Revenue Lines
item.description: ‘MSNBC Live ‘25: This Is Who We Are’ will see MSNBC talent like Rachel Maddow, Jen Psaki, Joe Scarborough and Mike Brzezinski host conversations on Oct. 11 in Manhattan.
